title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, January 20, 2022
description: Novelist Tami Hoag was born on this day, 1959.  One good thing about being a writer, she said, is “I’m not obligated to look good on a daily basis.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Novelist Tami Hoag was born on this day, 1959.  One good thing about being a writer, she said, is “I’m not obligated to look good on a daily basis.”
